name: Corruptlings of Kolliver
description:
Corruptlings of Kolliver is an indie RPG that takes place in the story-rich fantasy world of Kolliver.

Features:

  • Connect with a diverse cast of characters through quests and meaningful decisions.
  • Discover the consequences of the life energy known as quidessence through character interactions and snippets of history.
  • Explore the impact of your choices on the people of Kolliver and decide for yourself what it means to be "pure."
  • Fight or spare monsters in dungeons styled like an infinite platformer.
  • General focus on interactivity and fun.

Will you inspire peace between corruptlings and people? Or will another war break out between them? Your choices affect how the story plays out.

Most recent version: Demo v0.1

This is a passion project, inspired by games like Undertale, made by a solo developer. A demo is available and additions are currently being made. The final version will have the fully fleshed out story and locations.
